front.title: A Network Address Translator (NAT) Traversal Mechanism for Media Controlled by Real-Time Streaming Protocol (RTSP)

abstract.t: This document defines a solution for Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal for datagram based media streams set up and controlled with Real-time Streaming Protocol version 2 (RTSP 2.0). It uses Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE) adapted to use RTSP as a signalling channel, defining the necessary RTSP extensions and procedures.
